text: Nicholas Ray (born Raymond Nicholas Kienzle Jr., August 7, 1911 â€“ June 16, 1979) was an American movie director. He was best known for directing the movie Rebel Without a Cause. Ray died on June 16, 1979 in New York City of lung cancer, aged 67. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Movie directors from Wisconsin Category:Movie producers from Wisconsin Category:Screenwriters from Wisconsin
